channel.title: What do YOU like in a server?
channel.description:
Well i'm here making my new narbscape 4, wondering what the people like in their servers.
Please post what you think makes a server fun!
[b]YOU CAN POST ANYTHING YOU THINK MAKES A SERVER FUN, BUT HERE ARE SOME OPTIONS
All-out PK! (Almost everything is handed to you, no challenge at all) Pk server, with a small challenge. (MOST things are cheap in shops, and when you pk people you got tons of money) Rough-PK (Very challenging) [/b]
I was planning on making a pk server with a small challenge, so that when you kill someone, your reward is greater, because armor is worth more!
[glow=green,1,300]PLEASE POST YOUR OPINIONS[/glow]

I like servers that aren’t always the same(ffs find a place other than varrock and cwars and ardy!!!)

item.title: What do YOU like in a server?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

dismemberer:

I LOVE SERVERS THAT ARE HEAVEY ON THE MONSTERS, HAVE A SAFE ZONE IN VARROK, HAVE AWSOME SHOPS AND REALLY FAST LVLING UP

What would be the point in fast leveling? because then there is nothing to work for…

zammyking111:

i like regular servers I hate pking servers they are too hard too code

I find them actually very easy to code. Thats why i do pk servers.

Read full topic

item.title: What do YOU like in a server?
item.dc:creator: @Narbscape Narbscape
item.description:
@Narbscape wrote:

hmm, ok great, you guys sound exactly like I was hoping, this is gonna be good.

Ive added defenders, a great starting zone, easy training, obby mauls, hell great shops, and some good armor, easy to get but not TOO easy. also pk rewards are 5 times greater than usual servers. sound good?

I STILL NEED FEEBACK PEOPLE.

You can see a full list of updates made on my forum: Narbscape.tk

Read my sig for more info.

Read full topic
item.source: What do YOU like in a server?
